semantic_identifier: [GOLD-45]: Messaging Library Export API: implement bulk export endpoint with pagination + filters
title: Messaging Library Export API: implement bulk export endpoint with pagination + filters

sections.text: Implement the core bulk export endpoint(s) to return approved Messaging Library assets for a given workspace, with pagination (cursor/limit) and optional filters (asset type, segment/ICP, updated_since). Ensure stable ordering and include enough metadata for clients to sync incrementally (e.g., next_cursor, total_count when available). This ticket should focus on endpoint behavior and query performance; approval-state/versioning validation is handled in GOLD-44.
